column1: condition of a registered society or an inspection into the books of the registered society. Said
46  (1)  The  Register  may  of  his  own  motion  and  shall  on  the  application  of  a  majority  of  the
committee or of not less than one-third of the members of a registered society hold an inquiry or
inspection or direct some person authorized by him by orders in writing in that behalf to hold an
